name: Shibori green geometric
description:
This fabulous fabric pot plant is the perfect addition to your indoor garden. No water or sunlight required!

It is made from a dark green and cream shibori print fabric with dark green stitching. It sits in a 10cm (diameter) green ceramic pot and stands approx 22cm tall.

Buy it for your own home or give as a unique gift.
